title: 跪求所有ESS的指令权限，再不说麻麻要打人了QAQ（要中文(⊙o⊙)哦！）
txt_content: 跪求所有ESS的指令权限，要加上中文，大哥大姐们我给你们跪着了！{:10_512:}{:10_492:}

replies.txt_content: 恩！记得要中文！我把我的家当都拿出来了QAQ

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
看我签名链接；
search框输入指令就可以看到对应的权限节点了；
这东西基本上没有人回去翻译的；
因为没有这个必要；

jiuerd 发表于 2014-5-13 17:42
看我签名链接；
search框输入指令就可以看到对应的权限节点了；
这东西基本上没有人回去翻译的；
我要中文

这一列是分类


Cheat这一列是指令



bigtree这是权限



essentials.bigtree这是说明   可以不看         



Allow access to the /bigtree command.Cheatbreakessentials.breakAllows access to the /break command.Cheatbreakessentials.break.bedrockAllows the breaking of bedrock.Cheatenchantessentials.enchantAllows access to the /enchant command.Cheatenchantessentials.enchantments.[enchantmentname]Allows access to each enchantment type.Cheatenchantessentials.enchantments.allowunsafeIf enabled in the config, this permission allows unsafe enchantments.Cheatexpessentials.expAllow access to the /exp command.Cheatexpessentials.exp.giveAllows players to give themselves exp.Cheatexpessentials.exp.give.othersAllows players to give others exp (if they also have essentials.exp.give).Cheatexpessentials.exp.othersAllows players to see another players exp.Cheatexpessentials.exp.setAllows players to set their own exp.Cheatexpessentials.exp.set.othersAllows players to change others exp (if they also have essentials.exp.set).Cheatfeedessentials.feedAllows access to the /feed command.Cheatfeedessentials.feed.cooldown.bypassBypass the feed cooldownCheatfeedessentials.feed.othersAllows a player to feed another player.Cheatfireworkessentials.fireworkAllow access to the /firework command.Cheatfireworkessentials.firework.fireAllows a user to 'spawn' a copy of the firework held in their hands.Cheatflyessentials.flyAllow access to the /fly command.Cheatflyessentials.fly.othersAllows you to toggle fly for other players.Cheatflyessentials.fly.safeloginPlayers with this command will automatically switch to fly mode if they login whilst floating in the air.Cheatgamemodeessentials.gamemodeAllow access to the /gamemode command.Cheatgamemodeessentials.gamemode.othersAllows you to change the gamemode of other players.Cheatgiveessentials.itemspawn.meta-chapter-[chapter]Allows spawning of specific books only, from book.txt.Cheatgiveessentials.enchantments.[enchantmentname]Allows access to each enchantment type.Cheatgiveessentials.enchantments.allowunsafeIf enabled in the config, this permission allows unsafe enchantments.Cheatgiveessentials.giveAllow access to the /give command.Cheatgiveessentials.itemspawn.exemptAllows spawning of items on the spawn blacklist.Cheatgiveessentials.itemspawn.item-<itemname>If permission-based-item-spawn: Spawn <itemname>Cheatgiveessentials.itemspawn.item-[itemid]If permission-based-item-spawn: Spawn [itemid]Cheatgiveessentials.itemspawn.item-allIf permission-based-item-spawn: Spawn all itemsCheatgiveessentials.itemspawn.meta-authorAllow 'author' meta to be used in item spawning.Cheatgiveessentials.itemspawn.meta-bookAllows spawning of books with pre-filled content from books.txtCheatgiveessentials.itemspawn.meta-fireworkAllow specific meta for fireworks.Cheatgiveessentials.itemspawn.meta-headAllows spawning of mob heads.Cheatgiveessentials.itemspawn.meta-loreAllow replies.txt_content:
1696317745 发表于 2014-5-13 17:55
我要中文
我说了这东西基本上是不会有人去翻译的；
因为这些英文都是很简单的；
再不济你可以用google页面翻译一下；
你这样伸手是做不了一个好的管理者的；
而且服务器很多东西都是英文；
查查字典就知道了；
说什么没有时间都是懒的借口；
而且作为管理员，你应该懂得基础的命令；
你在search处输入/就可以看到所有与命令有关的权限；
如果你连命令的作用是什么都不知道的话；
那建议你做一个纯净的服务端；
然后安装汉化之后的ess插件；
后台输入？或者help；
出来的列表慢慢研究；
